svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
March 16, 2024" date: "2024-03-16"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
* Mainnet successfully upgraded to Dencun Consensus-specs v1.4.0 for Dencun mainnet
release
Mainnet successfully upgraded to Dencun
* Consensus-specs v1.4.0 for Dencun mainnet release
* EIP4844 (blobs) Layer 2: L2 fees drop to cents & below: L2 Fees , Gas Fees & grow
the pie L2s using blobs: zkSync Era , Starknet , Optimism & Base , Zora, Mode ,
Arbitrum and Paradex L2Beat data availability dashboard Dune blob dashboards: Hildobby
and 0xRob View blobs on Blobscan & Etherscan Finematics EIP4844 explainer Reminder:
write a data blog post for EF EIP4844 data challenge
EIP4844 (blobs)
* Layer 2: L2 fees drop to cents & below: L2 Fees , Gas Fees & grow the pie L2s using
blobs: zkSync Era , Starknet , Optimism & Base , Zora, Mode , Arbitrum and Paradex
L2Beat data availability dashboard Dune blob dashboards: Hildobby and 0xRob
Layer 2:
* L2 fees drop to cents & below: L2 Fees , Gas Fees & grow the pie
L2 fees drop to cents & below: L2 Fees , Gas Fees & grow the pie

Paradex
L2s using blobs: zkSync Era , Starknet , Optimism & Base , Zora, Mode , Arbitrum and
* L2Beat data availability dashboard
L2Beat data availability dashboard
* Dune blob dashboards: Hildobby and 0xRob
Dune blob dashboards: Hildobby and 0xRob
* View blobs on Blobscan & Etherscan
View blobs on Blobscan & Etherscan

Finematics EIP4844 explainer
* Reminder: write a data blog post for EF EIP4844 data challenge
Reminder: write a data blog post for EF EIP4844 data challenge
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
* Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) EIP2537 BLS :
discussions on adding decompress precompiles & exposing operations Potential EIP
discussions (but no decisions yet on what else to include): EIP3074 AUTH/AUTHCALL
opcodes : Dan Finlay (MetaMask) case for EIP7547 inclusion lists : breakout call
Monday EIP7623 increase CALLDATA cost : analysis , need feedback from L2s EIP7645
alias ORIGIN to SENDER : alternatively raise price
Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim :
* Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) EIP2537 BLS : discussions on adding
decompress precompiles & exposing operations Potential EIP discussions (but no
decisions yet on what else to include): EIP3074 AUTH/AUTHCALL opcodes : Dan Finlay
(MetaMask) case for EIP7547 inclusion lists : breakout call Monday EIP7623 increase
CALLDATA cost : analysis , need feedback from L2s EIP7645 alias ORIGIN to SENDER :
alternatively raise price
* EIP2537 BLS : discussions on adding decompress precompiles & exposing operations
EIP2537 BLS : discussions on adding decompress precompiles & exposing operations
* Potential EIP discussions (but no decisions yet on what else to include): EIP3074
AUTH/AUTHCALL opcodes : Dan Finlay (MetaMask) case for EIP7547 inclusion lists :
breakout call Monday EIP7623 increase CALLDATA cost : analysis , need feedback from
L2s EIP7645 alias ORIGIN to SENDER : alternatively raise price
Potential EIP discussions (but no decisions yet on what else to include):
* EIP3074 AUTH/AUTHCALL opcodes : Dan Finlay (MetaMask) case for
EIP3074 AUTH/AUTHCALL opcodes : Dan Finlay (MetaMask) case for
* EIP7547 inclusion lists : breakout call Monday
EIP7547 inclusion lists : breakout call Monday
* EIP7623 increase CALLDATA cost : analysis , need feedback from L2s
EIP7623 increase CALLDATA cost : analysis , need feedback from L2s
* EIP7645 alias ORIGIN to SENDER : alternatively raise price
EIP7645 alias ORIGIN to SENDER : alternatively raise price
* EIP6110 supply validator deposits onchain explainer
EIP6110 supply validator deposits onchain explainer
* Case for inclusion lists (EIP7547) in Electra
Case for inclusion lists (EIP7547) in Electra
This newsletter is sponsored by Pashov Audit Group !
Are you developing a blockchain protocol? Make sure to get a high-quality audit.
Audits are not silver bullets, but a good one drastically decreases the chances of a
successful attack. An ‚Äúinternal review‚Äù by your developers is not an audit. Without a
formal one many users won‚Äôt trust your protocol because you are putting their funds at
risk.
In Pashov Audit Group we know for a fact that we can help you secure your code in a
painless, high-quality and express manner. We are looking for established projects who
invest in security and are looking for the highest quality security partner.
We still have a couple of slots available over the next couple of months. Reach out
for security help - pashov.net
Osaka + F starname upgrade (meta EIP7607 )
* Verkle implementers call video & notes : Kaustinen-5 testnet soon DoS vector means
clients need to handle trie depth of 14-16
* Kaustinen-5 testnet soon
Kaustinen-5 testnet soon
* DoS vector means
DoS vector means
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* üö® Lido at 30.81% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 30.81% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 72%
supermajority, could cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 38% , any client bug
over 33.3% could mean loss of finality Prysm bug found on Goerli testnet highlights
need for client diversity
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority, could cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority, could cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm 38% , any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 38% , any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Prysm bug found on Goerli testnet highlights need for client diversity
Prysm bug found on Goerli testnet highlights need for client diversity
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Layer 1
* Reth (Rust based execution layer client) now in beta
Reth (Rust based execution layer client) now in beta
* Grandine (Rust based consensus layer client), open sourced with GPL v3.0 license
Grandine (Rust based consensus layer client), open sourced with GPL v3.0 license
* Vitalik: quantum emergency upgrade plan to save most user funds
Vitalik: quantum emergency upgrade plan to save most user funds
Client Releases
* Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.1.1 : hotfix Lodestar v1.17.0 : optimization update
Prysm v5.0.1 : minor patch release
Consensus layer:
* Lighthouse v5.1.1 : hotfix
Lighthouse v5.1.1 : hotfix
* Lodestar v1.17.0 : optimization update
Lodestar v1.17.0 : optimization update
* Prysm v5.0.1 : minor patch release
* Execution layer: Reth v0.2.0-beta.2 : resync required upgrading from alpha;
v0.1.0-alpha.22 : bug fix
Execution layer:
* Reth v0.2.0-beta.2 : resync required upgrading from alpha; v0.1.0-alpha.22 : bug fix
For Stakers
* Stereum v2.1 (node launcher): adds Obol support and SSV Network encrypted keys
Research
* Stake distribution analysis : change in issuance won‚Äôt change staking distribution
Stake distribution analysis : change in issuance won‚Äôt change staking distribution
* Data availability sampling strategies : lossy, incremental and diagonal sampling
Data availability sampling strategies : lossy, incremental and diagonal sampling
Layer 2
* Blast stopped producing blocks after mainnet Dencun upgrade, resolved
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs: EIP7650 : Programmable access lists
EIPs:
* EIP7650 : Programmable access lists
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7651 : Fractionally represented NFT ERC7652 : ERC721
guarantee extension ERC7653 : Named NFT (ERC721 extension) ERC7654 : Request method
types ERC7655 : ERC5189 operation receipts
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7651 : Fractionally represented NFT
ERC7651 : Fractionally represented NFT
* ERC7652 : ERC721 guarantee extension
ERC7652 : ERC721 guarantee extension
* ERC7653 : Named NFT (ERC721 extension)
ERC7653 : Named NFT (ERC721 extension)
* ERC7654 : Request method types
ERC7654 : Request method types
* ERC7655 : ERC5189 operation receipts
ERC7655 : ERC5189 operation receipts
Stuff for developers
* Solidity v0.8.25 : Cancun default EVM version, MCOPY used in code generator and
TSTORE usage warnings reduced to once per compilation
Solidity v0.8.25 : Cancun default EVM version, MCOPY used in code generator and TSTORE
usage warnings reduced to once per compilation
* Remix v0.45.0 : pin deployed contracts, VM state is saved and fetch code for
Blockscout verified contracts
Remix v0.45.0 : pin deployed contracts, VM state is saved and fetch code for
* Hardhat v2.22.1 : Hardhat Ignition default deployment system; v2.22.0 : Cancun
default EVM version for Hardhat Network
Hardhat v2.22.1 : Hardhat Ignition default deployment system; v2.22.0 : Cancun default
EVM version for Hardhat Network
* Ethernaut-cli (tool box): AI (requires OpenAI API key), utils, Hardhat tasks and
Ethernaut challenges; alpha
Ethernaut-cli (tool box): AI (requires OpenAI API key), utils, Hardhat tasks and
* Foundry: Forge-std v1.8.0 : uses native assertions, supports packed variables, adds
TOML read/write cheatcodes, native string manipulation cheatcodes and implements
interfaces in mock tokens Tip: console.log to debug a deployed contract using vm.etch
on a fork
Foundry:
* Forge-std v1.8.0 : uses native assertions, supports packed variables, adds TOML
read/write cheatcodes, native string manipulation cheatcodes and implements interfaces
in mock tokens
Forge-std v1.8.0 : uses native assertions, supports packed variables, adds TOML
* Tip: console.log to debug a deployed contract using vm.etch on a fork
Tip: console.log to debug a deployed contract using vm.etch on a fork
* Evm.codes adds Cancun opcodes
Evm.codes adds Cancun opcodes
* Tincho: solc skips code size check for external calls with return data, including
precompiles
Tincho: solc skips code size check for external calls with return data, including
* web3py middleware (v7 beta): class-based middleware replaces functional programming
paradigm
web3py middleware (v7 beta): class-based middleware replaces functional programming
* micro-eth-signer v0.8 : adds EIP4844 blob transaction support
micro-eth-signer v0.8 : adds EIP4844 blob transaction support
* Curta CTF CurtaLending solution
Curta CTF CurtaLending solution
* Node Guardians (gamified learning) adds Solidity & Huff quests
Node Guardians (gamified learning) adds Solidity & Huff quests
* Reminder: supported testnets Sepolia : use for application layer testing Hole≈°ky :
use for staking & infrastructure testing Ephemery : use for testing validator setups
Reminder: supported testnets
* Sepolia : use for application layer testing
Sepolia : use for application layer testing
* Hole≈°ky : use for staking & infrastructure testing
Hole≈°ky : use for staking & infrastructure testing
* Ephemery : use for testing validator setups
Ephemery : use for testing validator setups
Security
* Unizen $2.1M exploit via external call vulnerability after contract upgrade
Unizen $2.1M exploit via external call vulnerability after contract upgrade
* Mozaic $2M drained by malicious developer using private key
Mozaic $2M drained by malicious developer using private key
* Blastoff (yield aggregator) 150 ETH exploit on Blast
Blastoff (yield aggregator) 150 ETH exploit on Blast
* Juice staking 54 ETH exploit
Juice staking 54 ETH exploit
* FindAudit : p2p security marketplace
FindAudit : p2p security marketplace
Ecosystem
* EF Devcon Bangkok venue: Queen Sirikit National Convention Center
Job Listings
* Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer , FV Wizard .
Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer , FV Wizard .
* üî•OpenZeppelin is hiring: Open Source Development Manager & Product Manager
üî•OpenZeppelin is hiring: Open Source Development Manager & Product Manager
* IFT / Logos : ZK Researcher (Nomos); ZK Researcher (Vac) & ZK Engineer x2
IFT / Logos : ZK Researcher (Nomos); ZK Researcher (Vac) & ZK Engineer x2
* ChainSafe seek a Head of Protocol Engineering
ChainSafe seek a Head of Protocol Engineering
* Waku is hiring! Protocol Engineer , Waku SDK Software Engineer & Researcher
Waku is hiring! Protocol Engineer , Waku SDK Software Engineer & Researcher
* TechOps are looking for DevOps . Work on projects such as MakerDAO.
TechOps are looking for DevOps . Work on projects such as MakerDAO.
* Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
* Nethermind: Distributed Systems Dev Lead & Cryptography Researcher
Nethermind: Distributed Systems Dev Lead & Cryptography Researcher
* Sr. Developer Relations Manager & Technical Writer at Powerloom
Sr. Developer Relations Manager & Technical Writer at Powerloom
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 21.9 to 190.0 gwei, with 55.3 gwei average Zero
net issuance currently at 22.9 gwei 25k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 21.9 to 190.0 gwei, with 55.3 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 22.9 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.9 gwei
* 25k ETH net burn this week
25k ETH net burn this week
* ETHUSD : $3,590 - $4.071, currently $3,743
ETHUSD : $3,590 - $4.071, currently $3,743
* ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* Maker roadmap : phase 1 (mid year): launch new brand, stable & governance tokens,
lockstake engine and Spark SubDAO; phase 2: scale; phase 3; new L1; phase 4: end game
Maker roadmap : phase 1 (mid year): launch new brand, stable & governance tokens,
* Optimism We ‚ù§Ô∏è The Art NFT winners
Optimism We ‚ù§Ô∏è The Art NFT winners
* Internet of Agents research into AI agents running on blockchain infrastructure
Internet of Agents research into AI agents running on blockchain infrastructure
Regulation/business/tokens
* Ethereum institutional thesis : a store of value with cash flow
Ethereum institutional thesis : a store of value with cash flow
* London Stock Exchange accepting applications for ETH Exchange Traded Notes (ETNs)
London Stock Exchange accepting applications for ETH Exchange Traded Notes (ETNs)
* FT: Nigeria pressing Binance for info on top 100 users, 2 staff being held
FT: Nigeria pressing Binance for info on top 100 users, 2 staff being held
* Roman Sterlingov convicted in US for operating Bitcoin Fog mixer Professor J.W.
Verret says Sterlingov was merely an early user
Roman Sterlingov convicted in US for operating Bitcoin Fog mixer
* Professor J.W. Verret says Sterlingov was merely an early user
* US Copyright Office & PTO : new laws not required for infringement related to NFTs
US Copyright Office & PTO : new laws not required for infringement related to NFTs
* Paradigm: 19% of US registered voters bought crypto
Paradigm: 19% of US registered voters bought crypto
General
* Summer of Protocols 2024 applications open for protocol improvement grants, protocol
pill challenge & partner program
Summer of Protocols 2024 applications open for protocol improvement grants, protocol
* UK High Court judge ruled Craig Wright is not Satoshi in COPA v Wright trial
UK High Court judge ruled Craig Wright is not Satoshi in COPA v Wright trial
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-march-16-2024
